cbccore.movement
Class MotorDriveTrain

java.lang.Object
  cbccore.movement.DriveTrain
      cbccore.movement.MotorDriveTrain

public class MotorDriveTrain
extends DriveTrain

A basic DriveTrain with support for a dual-wheel-based motor system

Author:
Benjamin Woodruff
